0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: So you wish to be a god, Gale? You know the wizard Irenicus attempted the same thing, by leeching divine blood from a Bhaalspawn.
0.context: NodeContext: Curiousity, but slight edge to it - she hated Irenicus and his ambition, and is sounding Gale out.

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Aha, transfusion! An interesting strategy. Hard to get hold of a god's blood, of course, but if one could...

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: He managed it. After murdering my husband, and torturing my friends and I for half a year.
3.context: NodeContext: Deadpan. Not playing for sympathy - more a dry warning about what it takes.

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Did I say interesting? I meant terrible, of course. A terrible strategy...
2.context: NodeContext: Knows he put his foot in it, backpedalling fast
